text: Mary Ann Mendoza was pulled from the lineup of tonight’s Republican convention speakers after she encouraged her Twitter followers this morning to read through a QAnon believer’s convoluted conspiracy about a Jewish plot to control the world https://t.co/a9okS0pOjb
